name: u3t
description: Monorepo for U3T (u3t.app) - The online multiplayer ultimate tic-tac-toe
author: Chace Stewart

scripts.install-all: (cd common && npm install && npm run build) && (cd client && npm install) && (cd server && npm install) && npm install
scripts.start: (cd client && npm start) & (cd server && npm start)
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production && (npm run build-common) && (npm run build-client) && (npm run build-server)
